question: What is the full form of SIDBI?
option1: Small Industries development bank of India
option2: Small Investors development bank of India
option4: Small Infrastructure development bank of India
answer: Small Industries development bank of India
explanation: SIDBI stands for Small Industries development bank of India. It was established in 1990 as a subsidiary of the Industrial development bank of India. Its headquarters is at Lucknow, UP. SIDBI refinances loan & advances provided by the existing lending institution to small-scale units.
